name: Need For Speed Underground Rivals
description:
Hit the neon streets of Need for Speed™ Underground Rivals in pursuit of total ownership of the tuner racing scene. In this first-ever Need for Speed™ title for the PSP®, customize and build the ultimate tuner on four rims then take it into the underground world of street racing. With tons of tuning options, a variety of game modes, and the circuit’s most sought-after cars, Need for Speed™ Underground Rivals delivers an unrivaled tuner experience... in the palm of your hand.
